Mike,
 
steve and I got that same black one and could not do the modificati=
on we are electronically inept
Steve wrote to Sum Duc and asked if he could=
 figure out what pin to remove but he answered he could not.
I'm hoping you=
 have better luck. let me know
 
bruce

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investiga=
ting Team 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: michaelcoletta@...:=
 Tue, 27 Nov 2007 18:27:16 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: RCA 12-470 RADIO SHA=
CK HACK FILES




Okay... I have been having the oppisite problem with find=
ing a 12-470. The RS stores here have all older models, the one I already h=
acked. I finally found a store that had one newer model (0607) date code an=
d black case. Lets see what I can do with this model.Stay tuned...Mike--- I=
n EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>=
> HEY GUY'S > > OF COURSE I HAVE MY RS HACK AND GETTING RESULTS THE FIRST D=
AY.> MY INITIAL OPINION OF THE PERFORMANCE OF THIS LITTLE GEM IS FROM TWO >=
 EXPERIMENTAL SESSIONS ONE PERFORMED BY STEVE HULTAY AND MYSELF AND > THE O=
THER BY MYSELF ALONE. THE FILES I HAVE POSTED ARE GLEENED FROM > ONLY THE F=
IRST MINUTE OR SO OF A TEN MINUTE RECORDING.PLEASE TAKE A > MINUTE TO LISTE=
N AND POST YOUR FEEDBACK.> > THE FILES ARE POSTED IN THE FILE SECTION UNDER=
: > > 11-26-07_radio shack hack files_Bruce > > AFTER DOING ONLY ONE RECORD=
ED SESSION AND TWO SESSIONS TOTAL. I AS A > SERIOUS BOX RESEARCHER WITH EVR=
YDAY EXPERIMENTING ON FRANK'S,JOE'S > AND NOW THE RADIO SHACK HACK BOX CAN =
PREMATURELY SAY THAT THIS RADIO > MAY BE SMALL IN SIZE BUT IT PACKS A BIG P=
UNCH ! AND IT WAS UNDER OUR > VERY NOSES ALL THE TIME. THANKS TO SUM DUC FO=
R HIS INSIGHT IN > DISCOVERING IT.> > AT THE RISK OF SOUNDING REDUNDENT I M=
UST REITERATE THIS RS BOX WILL > HOLD IT'S OWN WITH THE BIG BOYS. THE RESUL=
TS AND LEVEL OF > COMMUNICATION BOTH IN REAL TIME DURING A SESSION AND WHAT=
 IS MISSED > BY OUR RUDIMENTARY HUMAN HEARING AND CAUGHT ON A RECORDING RIV=
ALS OR > MAY EVEN GIVEN ENOUGH TIME FOR FREQUENCY IMPRINTING BY OUR SPIRIT =
> FRIENDS AND PROPER RESEARCH METHODS WILL SURPASS JOE'S BOX AND PULL A > C=
LOSE SECOND TO FRANK'S BOX. > > AS A MATTER OF FACT MY FIRST IMPRESSION OF =
THE RS BOX WAS REMINICENT > OF THE AM LINEAR MODE OF MY FRANKS BOX #12. LET=
'S FACE IT A FRANKS > BOX IS A FRANKS BOX IN AS NO TWO ARE EXACTLY THE SAME=
 THAT IS WHAT > MAKES THEM SO UNIQUE AND ALSO THE FACT THAT I BELIEVE A SMA=
LL PART OF > FRANK HIMSELF TRANSFERS INTO EVERY BOX HE MAKES AND HE IS VERY=
 WELL > RESPECTED ON THE OTHER SIDE FROM WHAT MY GUIDES AND TECHS TELL ME.>=
 > I HAVE NOT HAD THE OPPORTUNITY TO USE RON RICKETS MINI BOX YET BUT I > A=
M HEARING VERY GOOD THINGS ABOUT IT'S PERFORMANCE ALSO AND CAN NOT > WAIT T=
O EXPERIMENT WITH IT.> > I THINK OUR FRIENDS ON THE OTHER SIDE ARE FINALY D=
ECIDING TO PUSH > FORWARD WITH THE COMMUNICATION PROCESS AND ALLOW IT TO BE=
COME > ACCESABLE TO MANY MORE PEOPLE. WHAT THEY HAVE CONVEYED TO ME OVER > =
NUMEROUS SESSIONS IS THE DESPERATE AND INTRIGAL NEED FOR COMBINED > HARMONY=
 AMONG RESEARCHERS AND COMMUNICATORS. THE MORE MINDS THAT ARE > THINKING AN=
D MOVING TOGETHER FOR THIS COMMON GOAL THE STRONGER THE > SPIRITS ABILITY T=
O COMMUNICATE AND THEY WILL HELP WITH DEVELOPE MENT > OF THE TECHNOLOGY SO =
THINGS ARE LOOKING UP AND HEADING TO THE FUTURE. > > WHAT I HAVE GATHERED O=
VER MANY SESSIONS IS THEY DEFINATELY WANT THE > WORD AND THE TECHNOLOGY SPR=
EAD TO AS MANY AS ARE WILLING TO ACCEPT IT > WITH AN OPEN MIND. I AM RATTLI=
NG ON AND HAVE DRIFTED FROM MY ORIGINAL > POINT WHICH WAS, THIS RADIO SHACK=
 BOX IS AND WILL BE A VERY IMPORTANT > AND USEFULL TOOL IN FURTHERING OUR C=
OMMUNICATION PROCESS.> > THANKS FOR LISTENING.> > BRUCE>

Okay... I have been having the o=
ppisite problem with finding a 12-470. The RS stores here have all older mo=
dels, the one I already hacked. I finally found a store that had one newer =
model (0607) date code and black case. Lets see what I can do with this mod=
el.<BR>Stay tuned...<BR>Mike<BR><BR>--- In <A href=3D"mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com">EVP-ITC@yahoogroups<WBR>.com</A>, "bhali333" <paranormalinves=
tig<WBR>ating@...<WBR>> wrote:<BR>><BR>> HEY GUY'S <BR>> <BR>&g=
t; OF COURSE I HAVE MY RS HACK AND GETTING RESULTS THE FIRST DAY.<BR>> M=
Y INITIAL OPINION OF THE PERFORMANCE OF THIS LITTLE GEM IS FROM TWO <BR>&gt=
; EXPERIMENTAL SESSIONS ONE PERFORMED BY STEVE HULTAY AND MYSELF AND <BR>&g=
t; THE OTHER BY MYSELF ALONE. THE FILES I HAVE POSTED ARE GLEENED FROM <BR>=
> ONLY THE FIRST MINUTE OR SO OF A TEN MINUTE RECORDING.PLEASE TAKE A <B=
R>> MINUTE TO LISTEN AND POST YOUR FEEDBACK.<BR>> <BR>> THE FILES =
ARE POSTED IN THE FILE SECTION UNDER: <BR>> <BR>> 11-26-07_radio shac=
k hack files_Bruce <BR>> <BR>> AFTER DOING ONLY ONE RECORDED SESSION =
AND TWO SESSIONS TOTAL. I AS A <BR>> SERIOUS BOX RESEARCHER WITH EVRYDAY=
 EXPERIMENTING ON FRANK'S,JOE'<WBR>S <BR>> AND NOW THE RADIO SHACK HACK =
BOX CAN PREMATURELY SAY THAT THIS RADIO <BR>> MAY BE SMALL IN SIZE BUT I=
T PACKS A BIG PUNCH ! AND IT WAS UNDER OUR <BR>> VERY NOSES ALL THE TIME=
. THANKS TO SUM DUC FOR HIS INSIGHT IN <BR>> DISCOVERING IT.<BR>> <BR=
>> AT THE RISK OF SOUNDING REDUNDENT I MUST REITERATE THIS RS BOX WILL <=
BR>> HOLD IT'S OWN WITH THE BIG BOYS. THE RESULTS AND LEVEL OF <BR>> =
COMMUNICATION BOTH IN REAL TIME DURING A SESSION AND WHAT IS MISSED <BR>&gt=
; BY OUR RUDIMENTARY HUMAN HEARING AND CAUGHT ON A RECORDING RIVALS OR <BR>=
> MAY EVEN GIVEN ENOUGH TIME FOR FREQUENCY IMPRINTING BY OUR SPIRIT <BR>=
> FRIENDS AND PROPER RESEARCH METHODS WILL SURPASS JOE'S BOX AND PULL A =
<BR>> CLOSE SECOND TO FRANK'S BOX. <BR>> <BR>> AS A MATTER OF FACT=
 MY FIRST IMPRESSION OF THE RS BOX WAS REMINICENT <BR>> OF THE AM LINEAR=
 MODE OF MY FRANKS BOX #12. LET'S FACE IT A FRANKS <BR>> BOX IS A FRANKS=
 BOX IN AS NO TWO ARE EXACTLY THE SAME THAT IS WHAT <BR>> MAKES THEM SO =
UNIQUE AND ALSO THE FACT THAT I BELIEVE A SMALL PART OF <BR>> FRANK HIMS=
ELF TRANSFERS INTO EVERY BOX HE MAKES AND HE IS VERY WELL <BR>> RESPECTE=
D ON THE OTHER SIDE FROM WHAT MY GUIDES AND TECHS TELL ME.<BR>> <BR>>=
 I HAVE NOT HAD THE OPPORTUNITY TO USE RON RICKETS MINI BOX YET BUT I <BR>&=
gt; AM HEARING VERY GOOD THINGS ABOUT IT'S PERFORMANCE ALSO AND CAN NOT <BR=
>> WAIT TO EXPERIMENT WITH IT.<BR>> <BR>> I THINK OUR FRIENDS ON T=
HE OTHER SIDE ARE FINALY DECIDING TO PUSH <BR>> FORWARD WITH THE COMMUNI=
CATION PROCESS AND ALLOW IT TO BECOME <BR>> ACCESABLE TO MANY MORE PEOPL=
E. WHAT THEY HAVE CONVEYED TO ME OVER <BR>> NUMEROUS SESSIONS IS THE DES=
PERATE AND INTRIGAL NEED FOR COMBINED <BR>> HARMONY AMONG RESEARCHERS AN=
D COMMUNICATORS. THE MORE MINDS THAT ARE <BR>> THINKING AND MOVING TOGET=
HER FOR THIS COMMON GOAL THE STRONGER THE <BR>> SPIRITS ABILITY TO COMMU=
NICATE AND THEY WILL HELP WITH DEVELOPE MENT <BR>> OF THE TECHNOLOGY SO =
THINGS ARE LOOKING UP AND HEADING TO THE FUTURE. <BR>> <BR>> WHAT I H=
AVE GATHERED OVER MANY SESSIONS IS THEY DEFINATELY WANT THE <BR>> WORD A=
ND THE TECHNOLOGY SPREAD TO AS MANY AS ARE WILLING TO ACCEPT IT <BR>> WI=
TH AN OPEN MIND. I AM RATTLING ON AND HAVE DRIFTED FROM MY ORIGINAL <BR>&gt=
; POINT WHICH WAS, THIS RADIO SHACK BOX IS AND WILL BE A VERY IMPORTANT <BR=
>> AND USEFULL TOOL IN FURTHERING OUR COMMUNICATION PROCESS.<BR>> <BR=
>> THANKS FOR LISTENING.<BR>> <BR>> BRUCE<BR>><BR><BR><BR></DIV=
